blood-n-guts.settings.blah: You have gone over the maximum points allowed for Point Buy
blood-n-guts.violence-config.currentLeve: Blood and gore level. Select a default or create or edit a custom Violence Level
blood-n-guts.violence-config.floorSplatS: This will increase the size of floor splats
blood-n-guts.violence-config.floorSplatD: This will increase the amount of floor splats
blood-n-guts.violence-config.tokenSplatS: This will increase the size of token splats
blood-n-guts.violence-config.tokenSplatD: This will increase the amount of token splats
blood-n-guts.violence-config.trailSplatS: This will increase the size of splats in a blood trail
blood-n-guts.violence-config.trailSplatD: This will increase the amount of blood splats in a trail
blood-n-guts.violence-config.splatSpread: This will increase the spread of splats
blood-n-guts.violence-config.healthThres: The % of max health to start showing splats e.g. 1.0 will show splats all the time, 0.25 will show splats when HP is 25% or less.
blood-n-guts.violence-config.damageThres: The % of max damage to show splats. e.g. 0 will never show splats, 0.25 will show them on a hit that reduces health by 25%.
blood-n-guts.violence-config.deathMultip: Scales the amount of blood to show on a death hit
blood-n-guts.violence-config.sceneSplatP: The max amount of splats to display at once
blood-n-guts.advanced-config.title: Blood n Guts - Advanced Configuration
blood-n-guts.advanced-config.floorSplatF: Select the font to use for blood splatter on the floor
blood-n-guts.advanced-config.tokenSplatF: Select the font to use for token blood splatter
blood-n-guts.advanced-config.trailSplatF: Select the font to use for blood trails
